name: Country Crush
description:
Country Crush – The Countryballs Saga

Country Crush is an epic match 3 puzzle game by BitStern. Use crushing combinations and conquer new worlds completing levels with tanks and explosions! Explore new countries from Germany to the U.S. to Russia. Discover even space in this Countryballs and Polandball world!
Play Country Crush on your own or with friends to get new high score record!

Country Crush – The Countryballs Saga features:
* More than 100 levels!
* Addictive classic match 3 puzzle game.
* Switch weapons for epic explosions!
* No soda, sweets or candy this time!
* Match five to get an atomic special!
* Explore new countries.
* Easy to learn, hard to master.
* For players that connect to Facebook, you can see your friends on the map. Compare your best scores!


Follow us to get news and updates:

YouTube https://www.youtube.com/bitstern
Twitter https://twitter.com/bitstern @BitStern
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/bitstern

Be awesome playing Country Crush!
